verses.verse: Lord <S%H3068><s%>, my heart <S%H3820><s%> is not haughty <S%H1361><s%>, nor my eyes <S%H5869><s%> lofty <S%H7311><s%>: neither do I exercise <S%H1980><s%> myself in great matters <S%H1419><s%>, or in things too high for me <S%H6381><s%>.

Surely I have behaved <S%H7737><s%> and quieted <S%H1826><s%> myself <S%H5315><s%>, as a child that is weaned <S%H1580><s%> of his mother <S%H517><s%>: my soul <S%H5315><s%> is even as a weaned child <S%H1580><s%>.
Let Israel <S%H3478><s%> hope <S%H3176><s%> in the Lord <S%H3068><s%> from henceforth and for <S%H5704><s%> ever <S%H5769><s%>.
